item.description:
The 2nd Annual BeerEncounters.com Great Pumpkin Halloween party featuring great seasonal craft brews from some of the best breweries the region has to offer.

About The Great Pumpkin Halloween Party
Sample a wide variety of Pumpkin Ales, Oktoberfest and fall seasonal offerings! Visit the breweries exhibit booth for free samples and giveaways! Enjoy music from New Hampshire's own DJ Matty Z. Stuff your face with a bunch of food that goes great with beer; Win great prizes for Best Costume! Try your luck at Pumpkin bowling. Witness an incredible light show with great music. Rub elbows with costumed characters in a harrowing atmosphere. Get an assortment of Souvenir Photos. Visit the caricatures artist and have your own picture done. Climb aboard the giant pirate ship. Excellent door prizes from New England brewing companies

http://www.beerencoun...

Cost: $20.00

Note: This event will sell out. Buy your ticket here.
http://www.beerencoun...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the entrance wearing a knight costume and meetup name tag.
item.name: Brews & Blues Event: 2nd Annual Great Pumpkin Halloween Party
